result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Veronica Jacqueline Star Belille

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
9:17 AM Defendant Veronica Jacqueline Star Belille in court.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address. Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.   DEF indicates does not qualify for PD appointment, Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy.   Court enters NG Plea to Counts 2 and 3.  DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Status conference scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on November 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Bail/bond hearing on July 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:18 AM DEF Veronica Jacqueline Star Belille_in court, appearing in custody by video from the Sawyer County Jail, with Atty Conner Hanson, Intern (special appearance) in court.  Kenneth Sortedahl appeared by video for the State of WI.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  DE verifies DOB and Address.  DE does not qualify for public defender.  Court finds probable cause.  State makes bond recommendation.  Atty Hanson No objection.  Court sets bond. SIBS $2500   Court gives the DE the attorney colloquy. Court sets INITIAL APPEARANCE for  at 8:30AM.
Hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
